description: Data from kiln operation and clinker quality

fields.primary_air_flow_nm3_hr: float, primary air flow in Nm3/hr
fields.secondary_air_flow_nm3_hr: float, secondary air flow in Nm3/hr
fields.coal_feed_rate_tph: float, coal feed rate in tonnes per hour
fields.oil_injection_lph: float, oil injection rate in liters per hour
fields.kiln_exit_o2_pct: float, oxygen percentage at kiln exit
fields.kiln_exit_co_ppm: float, CO concentration at kiln exit in ppm
fields.kiln_exit_no_x_ppm: float, NOx concentration at kiln exit in ppm
fields.kiln_exit_so2_ppm: float, SO2 concentration at kiln exit in ppm
fields.cooler_air_flow_nm3_hr: float, cooler air flow in Nm3/hr
fields.cooler_fan_power_kw: float, power consumption of cooler fan
fields.clinker_discharge_rate_tph: float, clinker discharge rate in tonnes per hour
fields.specific_heat_consumption_kcal_kg: float, specific heat consumption in kcal/kg
fields.kiln_specific_power_kwht: float, specific power consumption of kiln in kWh/t
fields.high_co_alarm: integer, high CO alarm status (0: Off, 1: On)
fields.flame_instability_alarm: integer, flame instability alarm status (0: Off, 1: On)
fields.kiln_vibration_alarm: integer, kiln vibration alarm status (0: Off, 1: On)
fields.cooler_fan_failure_alarm: integer, cooler fan failure alarm status (0: Off, 1: On)
fields.kiln_feed_tph: float, kiln feed rate in tonnes per hour
fields.kiln_main_burner_fuel_kgph: float, main burner fuel consumption in kg per hour
fields.kiln_secondary_air_temp_c: float, temperature of secondary air in kiln (Celsius)
fields.kiln_exit_gas_temp_c: float, temperature of exit gas in kiln (Celsius)
fields.clinker_quality_lsf: float, lime saturation factor of clinker
fields.clinker_free_lime_pct: float, free lime percentage in clinker
fields.cooler_pressure_drop_pa: float, pressure drop across cooler in Pa
fields.kiln_NOx_ppm: float, NOx concentration in kiln in ppm
fields.kiln_CO_ppm: float, CO concentration in kiln in ppm
